doctor.name: Dr. Md. Asraful Alam
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Asraful Alam is a Anesthesiologist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Anesthesia), Diploma (Ultrasound). He is a Assistant Registrar, Anesthesia at 250 Bedded General Hospital, Pabna. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Model Hospital & Diagnostic, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Asraful Alam at Model Hospital & Diagnostic, Pabna is 2.30pm to 8pm (Everyday).

chamber.address: Shapla Plastic Mor, Hospital Road, Shalgaria, Pabna

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Shamsul Haque
doctor.specialty: Anesthesiology, Pain & Intensive Care Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Shamsul Haque is a Anesthesiologist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), DA. He is a Former Associate Professor, Anesthesiology at Pabna Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Digital Diagnostic Center, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Shamsul Haque at Digital Diagnostic Center, Pabna is 5pm to 7pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Kazi Office Road, Thana Para, Shalgaria, Pabna
